General.Name: Adamera Minerals Corp.
General.Description: Adamera Minerals Corp., an exploration stage company, acquires and explores for precious metals. The company primarily explores for silver, gold, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. It owns interests in the Cooke Mountain, Empire Creek, Flag Hill, Buckhorn, and Talisman properties located in Washington, the United States; and Hedley property located in British Columbia, Canada. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V6

1.Name: Mr. Mark Thomas Brown B.Com., B.Comm., C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
